ygData.subject: Re: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The problem with the Necro Charm is that they could only charm creatures that are less powerful than their pet.   I haven t had Dot problems in a long
ygData.messageBody:
Jeremy Cobb wrote:

> From: Jeremy Cobb <jeremy@...>
>
> Why was the charm spell useless for Necro's? it worked the same as the
> enchanters, right? Necro's over the last couple months have gotten hammered
> big time. The charm and fear nerf changes nothing in non PVP situations
> (which probably counts for 95% of the time). My necro would be very happy
> if his DOT's worked corectly in non PVP, or his life suck, or his Pet, or
> Feign Death. Be thankful.

The problem with the Necro Charm is that they could only charm creatures that
are less powerful than their pet. I haven't had Dot problems in a long time.
The resist on life taps and fiegn death do suck though. My heart goes out to
you there.


Cheers
